page.title: 04HEALTH CARE IN BELLE VALE
page.content: Quite recently a health centre was opened at the end of Hedgfield Road. The facilites include a dentist & an optician.A lot of people from our school go to the dentist there because it is so convenient for the people who live in the the Belle Vale area.Also within the{health centre complex}is a chiropodist & a very good baby clinic & nursery.The local midwifes & health visitors use the centre as their base. There are six doctors & if you want to make an appointment you only have to make a phone call but failing this you may have to wait longer.Every family has a particular doctor but if he is off you are given any doctor who is available.One disadvantage about the health centre is that doctors have moved from there original surgeries & may now be further away from their patients.
